description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. The ultimate multiplayer survival adventure set in an ever-changing city full of guns, secrets and loot during a zombie apocalypse. Survive each day in 4 player multiplayer in LAN or ONLINE as you fight against the undead! Never play the same game twice with our unique world that dynamically changes with every new match you play!
